verbs.description: You [V: ca] n’t be friends with people who disagree with you about politics . At least that ’s what Salon wants you to think . Salon political staff writer Chauncey Devega commands you to cut Trump supporters completely out of your life , saying that , “ If you have friends or relatives who support Donald Trump you should confront them . Explain to them that they are complicit with Trump 's
